channel.title: genomics on Jaime Ashander
channel.description: Recent content in genomics on Jaime Ashander

item.title: Inference in complex systems
item.author: ashander AT rff org (Jaime Ashander)
item.description: Inference of process from pattern is a major methodological challenge, yet increasingly available “big” phenotypic and genomic data promises to shed light on otherwise-difficult-to-collect vital rates in natural populations. I develop and apply methods to use this data to understand and conserve natural populations in human-dominated systems.
